import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.23ed954b:
from sklearn.decomposition import PCA
pca = PCA(n_components = 2)
principalComponents = pca.fit_transform(x)
principalDf = pd.DataFrame(data = principalComponents, columns = ['principal component 1', 'principal component 2'])
principalDf.head()
source.65b6884f:
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
le = LabelEncoder()
finalDf['Species'] = le.fit_transform(finalDf['Species'])
finalDf
source.7eabcfa7:
plt.scatter(finalDf[finalDf['Species']==0]['principal component 1'], finalDf[finalDf['Species']==0]['principal component 2'], c='red', label = 'Iris-setosa')
plt.scatter(finalDf[finalDf['Species']==1]['principal component 1'], finalDf[finalDf['Species']==1]['principal component 2'], c='yellow', label = 'Iris-versicolor')
plt.scatter(finalDf[finalDf['Species']==2]['principal component 1'], finalDf[finalDf['Species']==2]['principal component 2'], c='green' , label = 'Iris-virginica')
plt.legend()
plt.show()
